items.title: Iran wants to make deal rather than face military action, Trump says
items.description: Tehran has said it will never negotiate on its missile and defence systems, but that it is open to talks.

items.title: Former CNN host Don Lemon faces charges after anti-ICE protest at Minnesota church
items.description: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

items.title: Civil rights investigation opened into Alex Pretti shooting
items.description: The deputy attorney general said it was a “standard investigation” after Pretti's fatal shooting in Minneapolis.

items.title: Three reasons for the record rise in gold prices, and one why they are falling
items.description: Gold has fallen from recent highs but there are several reasons investors are still finding refuge in the precious metal.

items.title: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
items.description: Prosecutors say Mamadou Hawa Gassama described Alassane Ouattara as a "tyrant" and "an enemy of Mali".
